root.name: Metal Dungeon
root.description: In Metal Dungeon, you create a customized party of characters that could use a variety of weapons and skills that you acquired in your explorations of the dungeon.PlotResearchers attempt to use an ancient creature known as the "Gods of Magic" to create monsters that are under their control, but the "Gods of Magic" broke free of their control, slaughtering them all and taking control of the installation.The need to stop this creature is imperative and many Cyborg Enforcer Teams are dispatched into the dungeon.
